__prompts__.assembly_name: Enter the name of the project.
__prompts__.api_app_name: Enter the name of the project api
__prompts__.oauth_api_audience_dev: Enter the OAuth audience for development, (https://{project_dev_domain}/api/v2/)
__prompts__.oauth_api_audience_prod: Enter the OAuth audience for production, (https://{project_production_domain}/api/v2/)
__prompts__.oauth_app_name: Enter the application name for the api from OAuth,({projectName})
__prompts__.oauth_domain_dev: Enter the domain for development from OAuth,(dev-22u8ixu7cdssc581t.us.auth0.com)
__prompts__.oauth_domain_prod: Enter the domain for production from OAuth,({projectName}-production.us.auth0.com)
__prompts__.azure_key_vault_staging: Enter the name of the Azure key vault for staging, ({projectName}-Staging)
__prompts__.azure_key_vault_prod: Enter the name of the Azure key vault for production, ({projectName}-Production
__prompts__.azure_storage_connection_staging: Enter the connection string to Azure storage
__prompts__.azure_container_dev: Enter the storage container name for development, (development)
__prompts__.azure_container_staging: Enter the storage container name for staging, (staging)
__prompts__.azure_container_prod: Enter the storage container name for production, (production)
__prompts__.azure_storage_account_name_dev: Enter the storage account name for development, ({projectName}}assetsstaging)
__prompts__.azure_storage_account_name_prod: Enter the storage account name for production, ({projectName}}assetsprod)
__prompts__.azure_container_registry_server_staging: Enter the Azure container registry name for staging, (cr3hmn6weg7opbk.azurecr.io)
__prompts__.azure_container_registry_user_staging: Enter the Azure container user for staging, (cr3hmn6weg7opbk)
__prompts__.azure_container_registry_server_prod: Enter the Azure container registry name for production, (crcp24evzhtokxg.azurecr.io)
__prompts__.azure_container_registry_user_prod: Enter the Azure container user for production, (crcp24evzhtokxg)
